title: 37. Roomie Chat: Why I Made a Skincare Line, My Beef With Skincare Reviews, Do I Get Botox/ Filler? Answering Your Q's!
description:
Hi Roomies!! It's another Q+A style solo eppy answering random Qs from Instagram.

This episode covers:

- why I started my skincare line and who it's for

- my ideal lifestyle

- how to prep skin for extractions

- how I feel about skincare reviews on social media

- do I get botox and filler?

- my fav moisturizers

You can shop my Glymed store here

products mentioned:

Glymed Oxygen Treatment Cream

Daily Repair Mega Moisture

Intense Peptide 

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa
